attributes.action: Set up an independently judged STUNT OFF between members of Wadeye and Wonk Unit
attributes.additional_details:
We believe it is in the public interest for these sports to be regulated and recognised as a legitimate way to defend one's honour and demand satisfaction, similar to other honour blood-sports such as duelling and jousting and fencing.

We propose this start with a publicly funded stuntumentary following the backgrounds of members of the punk stunting cliques known as Wadeye and Wonk Unit (they also make beautiful music). The film can feature the first official UK stunt off: "WAD vs. WONK 2016".
attributes.background: Due to a lack of public funding for sports like 'Parkour' and 'Pro-Stunting', parkour and stunt enthusiasts such as members of the famous punk bands Wadeye and Wonk Unit are forced to settle their beefs in unsafe underground "stunt offs" which are completely unregulated and extremely dangerous.
